text: Fukaya Station (深谷駅, ふかやえき) is a railway station of JR East in Fukaya, Saitama Prefecture, Japan. == Adjacent stations == ; JR East : Takasaki Line :: Urban Rapid, Local ::: Kagohara - Fukaya - Okabe == Other websites == * Fukaya Station (Official Site) Category:Railway stations in Saitama Prefecture
title: Fukaya Station
